front.title: Logical Analysis of the Binary Representation and the IP Specifications for the IPv7 and IPv8 Addressing Systems

abstract.t: The Information Age Revolution established by the Internet, as viewed through its World Wide Popularity, ushered not only a need for additional IP Addresses, which serve the ever growing needs and demands of every individual in the World today. Will also be viewed, through the resolution of the IP addressing problem, as the impetus fueling the Revolution in the whole of the Mathematical and Engineering Sciences as well.
